prompt: Subject: Eleven and The Man (young Chinese couple). Context: Autumn park with swirling golden-red leaves. Action: Running together, laughing, exuding playful energy and freedom. Style: Warm, romantic, cinematic with soft-focus dreamlike visuals. Composition: Medium shot capturing both figures mid-run, surrounded by swirling leaves. Ambiance: Golden-hour lighting, vibrant golden and red autumn tones, warm and joyful.
camera_movement: tracking shot at eye level, dynamically following their movement
